title: Weinstein surrenders to police
text:
Weinstein surrenders to police 2:40pm BST - 00:40
Film producer Harvey Weinstein surrendered to authorities in New York on Friday, months after he was toppled from Hollywood's most powerful ranks by scores of women accusing him of sexual assault, a person familiar with the case said. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
